documentation.text:
finalize current game, get ready for next one.
/ @dev current state will be resolved at this point.
/ If called from level 1, then staker is rewarded.
/ When called from any other level, means that every
/ other staker told the truth but the one in between
/ lied.

devdoc.details: All source of truth regarding updates & challenges comes from the GameOwner contractThis contract's convention: prepend _ to function inputs only.

finalize().details: current state will be resolved at this point. / If called from level 1, then staker is rewarded. / When called from any other level, means that every / other staker told the truth but the one in between / lied.

update(uint16,address).details: This function will also resolve previous updates when       level is below current or level has reached the end

params._staker: address of the staker that reports this update

devdoc.title: Manages Stakers and their deposits. Agnostic of the rules behind the game.

alreadyDidUpdate(address).notice: View Functions this function iterates over a storage array, but of max length 4.

finalize().notice: finalize current game, get ready for next one.

setGameOwner(address).notice: External / Public Functions sets the address of the external contract that interacts with this contract

unEnroll().notice: unregisters a new staker and transfers all earnings, and pot

withdraw().notice: transfers pendingWithdrawals to the calling staker; the stake remains until unenrol is called
